home.hero_title: The Future of Tech & AI Marketplace
home.hero_subtitle: The world's first free marketplace dedicated to high-tech and artificial intelligence
home.hero_headline_alt1: Find AI Talent at Lightning Speed
home.hero_headline_alt2: Trusted Tech Marketplace for Rapid Growth
home.hero_headline_alt3: Build AI Solutions with a Thriving Community
home.hero_subheadline_alt1: Instantly match with vetted experts and launch projects faster than ever.
home.hero_subheadline_alt2: Experience secure transactions and transparent reviews for worry-free collaboration.
home.hero_subheadline_alt3: Meet innovators worldwide, share ideas, and grow together in our vibrant network.
home.video_script: Welcome to Zion, the marketplace where tech innovation meets opportunity. In sixty seconds you'll see how quickly Zion connects you with the right talent and resources. Our intelligent matcher analyzes requirements to recommend verified experts in moments. Showcase your skills in the talent directory and get hired by companies that value speed and trust. Browse services and equipment, then work directly with the community. Share ideas, collaborate, and build lasting partnerships in our vibrant forums. Whether you're a startup or an enterprise, Zion streamlines every step so you can focus on creating. Join us and experience the future of tech marketplaces today.
home.tools_description: Everything you need to connect with the AI and tech ecosystem
home.seo_title: The Future of Tech & AI Marketplace
home.seo_description: The world's first free marketplace dedicated to high-tech and artificial intelligence. Publish, connect, and thrive — all in one place.
home.seo_keywords: AI marketplace, tech services, artificial intelligence, IT services, AI developers, technology marketplace, AI solutions
home.tool_ai_matcher_desc: Let our AI find the perfect match for your project needs
home.tool_talent_desc: Browse our curated collection of AI and tech specialists
home.tool_services_desc: Discover professional services for your tech projects
home.tool_equipment_desc: Rent or buy specialized hardware and tech equipment
home.tool_analytics_desc: Insights and trends in the AI and tech industry
home.tool_chat_desc: Get instant assistance from our AI-powered chat
home.header_tagline: Your gateway to AI & tech solutions
home.quick_access_subtitle: Jump directly to our most popular features
home.features_subheading: Explore our comprehensive suite of tools designed to transform how you connect, collaborate, and create in the tech ecosystem.
home.categories_subtitle: Discover our comprehensive ecosystem of tech services, talent, equipment, and innovation

features.ai_talent_matching_desc: Our AI-powered matching algorithm connects you with the perfect talent or job based on skills, experience, and preferences.
features.ai_talent_matching_details: Leveraging advanced machine learning, our matching system analyzes over 100+ data points to create perfect connections between talents and opportunities.
features.ai_talent_matching_summary: Zion’s AI Matcher quickly analyzes your project requirements and talent profiles to deliver the most relevant connections. Save hours of searching and start collaborating with the right experts in moments.
features.ai_talent_matching_tagline: Lightning-fast AI matches for every project.
features.talent_directory_desc: Browse our extensive database of verified AI and tech specialists, filtered by expertise and availability.
features.talent_directory_details: Every talent in our directory undergoes a rigorous verification process to ensure quality, authenticity, and reliability.
features.talent_directory_summary: Browse a trusted directory of vetted engineers, designers, and consultants. Detailed profiles and availability updates help you hire with confidence from anywhere in the world.
features.talent_directory_tagline: Your go-to roster of verified experts.
features.services_marketplace_desc: Discover professional tech and AI services for your business needs, from development to consulting.
features.services_marketplace_details: From on-demand IT support to specialized AI development, our marketplace offers verified services with transparent pricing and reviews.
features.services_marketplace_summary: Find professional tech and AI services including development, consulting, and support. Transparent pricing and ratings ensure you select the best provider for every task.
features.services_marketplace_tagline: Hire top tech talent in minutes.
features.equipment_catalog_desc: Find specialized hardware and tech equipment for AI development and research.
features.equipment_catalog_details: Access cutting-edge technology with flexible options to buy, rent, or lease specialized equipment for your tech projects.
features.equipment_catalog_summary: Access cutting-edge hardware and specialized devices for rent or purchase. Flexible terms let you scale resources on demand without heavy upfront costs.
features.equipment_catalog_tagline: Gear up with the latest hardware.
features.community_hub_desc: Connect with like-minded professionals, share insights, and stay updated with industry trends.
features.community_hub_details: Join thousands of tech professionals in discussions, AMAs with industry leaders, and exclusive community events.
features.community_hub_summary: Connect with peers, join discussions, and share knowledge in our community hub. Events, groups, and messaging keep you engaged and supported.
features.mobile_app_desc: Take Zion with you on the go with our mobile app for iOS and Android devices.
features.mobile_app_details: Manage your projects, communicate with clients or talents, and receive real-time updates wherever you are.
features.mobile_app_summary: Manage your projects and messages on the go with Zion’s mobile app. Get real-time alerts and easily browse listings from any device.
features.mobile_app_tagline: Marketplace power right in your pocket.
features.enterprise_solutions_desc: Custom-branded hiring portal, dedicated talent pool, and powerful admin controls for your organization.
features.enterprise_solutions_details: Scale your talent acquisition with white-labeled solutions, analytics dashboards, and dedicated account managers.
features.developer_tools_desc: Access our API documentation, SDKs, and integration guides to build on top of the Zion platform.
features.developer_tools_details: Leverage our robust API with comprehensive documentation, code examples, and developer support.
features.developer_tools_tagline: Build faster using our robust APIs.
features.learning_resources_desc: Access tutorials, courses, and documentation to enhance your skills in AI and tech.
features.learning_resources_details: From beginner guides to advanced technical content, our learning resources help you stay at the cutting edge of technology.
features.learning_resources_tagline: Level up with curated tech knowledge.
features.project_management_desc: Streamlined tools to manage projects, track milestones, and ensure successful delivery.
features.project_management_details: Our intuitive project management tools help you track progress, manage deliverables, and ensure timely completion.
features.project_management_tagline: Keep every task on track easily.
features.zion_hire_ai_desc: AI-powered recruiting assistant to streamline your hiring process and find better matches.
features.zion_hire_ai_details: Automate screening, improve candidate matching, and enhance the hiring experience with our AI recruiting solution.
features.talent_marketplace_tagline: Discover top talent and gigs instantly.

newsletter.subject1: Welcome to Zion: Let's Innovate Together
newsletter.subject2: Thanks for Joining the Zion Community!
newsletter.welcome_email: Hello and welcome to Zion! Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter. Each week, we share the latest marketplace listings, expert tips, and community events designed to accelerate your success. Whether you’re hiring talent, offering services, or exploring new tools, our goal is to keep you informed and inspired. Be on the lookout for special member perks and early access to upcoming features. If you ever have questions or suggestions, simply reply to this email—we love hearing from our community. Plus, you'll receive exclusive invites to webinars and product launches. Our team is committed to empowering you with the insights you need to stay ahead in the fast-moving AI industry. Welcome aboard!

benefits.ai_matchmaking_desc: Our advanced algorithms match your needs with the perfect service providers or products, saving you time and ensuring optimal results.
benefits.global_availability_desc: Access a worldwide network of tech talents, products, and services to find the best solutions regardless of geographic limitations.
benefits.support_24_7_desc: Our dedicated team is available around the clock to assist with any questions or issues you might encounter during your journey.
benefits.cost_reduction_desc: Eliminate middlemen and reduce costs by up to 40% through direct connections with service providers and product vendors.

how_it_works.post_desc: Publish your service, job, or equipment in minutes with our AI-powered form.
how_it_works.match_desc: Our AI automatically matches your needs with the perfect providers or opportunities.
how_it_works.hire_buy_desc: Connect directly with matched providers and complete your transaction securely.
how_it_works.done_desc: Enjoy hassle-free delivery and support for your technology solutions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how Zion Tech Group handles your data and protects your privacy.
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This page explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy.data_collection: We collect personal information you provide when creating an account or using our services. This can include your name, email address and any other details required to deliver marketplace features.
privacy.data_usage: Zion Tech Group uses this data solely to operate and improve our platform. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
privacy.contact_info: If you have questions about our privacy practices, please contact us at

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: The terms and conditions for using the Zion platform.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Zion Tech Group. These Terms of Service govern your use of our marketplace platform.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.content: You must create an account to access certain features of the platform. You are responsible for keeping your login credentials secure.

payments.title: Payments
payments.content: All transactions are processed securely. You agree to provide accurate billing details and comply with our payment policies.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibited.content: Users may not engage in fraudulent, abusive, or illegal activities while using the platform.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your account if you violate these terms or engage in activities that harm the platform or other users.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, contact us at support@ziontechgroup.com.
